title: Baby girl
creator_contributor_role: Council of Australian Governments (COAG) Youth at Centre Project, partner
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Social life and customs
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Mothers and daughters
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Teenage girls
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Teenage girls
description: Life is very challenging for Chrissy as a teenage mum but through her love for daughter Lakeisha combined with the support of family and friends, she has been able to complete her school studies and begin training as a nurse. This is dedicated to her baby girl.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000829; Our stories; Active; 2006
